about_the_game:
Own the unique and exciting music from Golem Creation Kit in all its 16-bit glory! This soundtrack includes the full list of GCK's music -- 30 minutes of sweet retro variety to delight your auditory orifices, crafted by expert composer Steve Barnes.

If you enjoyed the game, this is a no-brainer of a deal.
